fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / TWINS AND RADIO
fields.Description: Fires after you've heard the Twins testimony with Kim. He reveals he knows the station. Weird if true, worth giving them a call.

fields.Title: START
input
Kim Kitsuragi: ""So. Those voices they heard...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So. Those voices they heard..."

fields.Title: Variable["village.twins_reactionspeed_speedfreak_memory"]
Variable["village.twins_reactionspeed_speedfreak_memory"]
!(Variable["village.twins_reactionspeed_speedfreak_memory"])
You: ""Maybe they're psychic recruit mate..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe they're psychic recruit material for the Remote Viewers Division?"

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe it has something to do with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe it has something to do with the mass call-in *radio* game?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That doesn't seem likely to me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That doesn't seem likely to me."

fields.Title: Drama: "The machinery of his mind is at wor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The machinery of his mind is at work, sire! With swiftness the gears do turn, for to produce *deceit*! He seeks to hide his fondness for his favourite channel, Speedfreaks FM!

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe it is connected, though. Rub..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe it is connected, though. Ruby had all those frequencies in her lorry, remember?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The washerwoman seems to know ever..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The washerwoman seems to know everything that happens here. Let's ask if she heard anything, before moving on."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks_without_kim_there"]
Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks_without_kim_there"]
!(Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks_without_kim_there"])
Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant says nothing. An oce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant says nothing. An ocean breeze blows in strong. He raises his jacket collar against it.

fields.Title: Volition: "Don't."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant breathes steadily, e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant breathes steadily, each inhalation and exhalation controlled.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't explain how they heard it,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't explain how they heard it," the lieutenant continues unabated. "I believe they heard something. And given the poverty of this part of town, I don't know how they could have heard a radio. However..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If it was... that can't be it." Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If it was... that can't be it." The lieutenant frowns.

fields.Title: You: ""Even if it was a radio, where was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Even if it was a radio, where was it coming from?"

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds a bit rough for me. I like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds a bit rough for me. I like tenderness in my radio, I think."

fields.Title: You: ""Radio culture, huh? That makes sen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Radio culture, huh? That makes sense."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. And my radio habits are not re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. And my radio habits are not relevant to this serious murder investigation."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shrugs."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant shrugs.

fields.Title: You: ""Radio culture. Sure.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Radio culture. Sure."

fields.Title: You: ""Speedfreaks FM! Your favourite cha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Speedfreaks FM! Your favourite channel!"

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks_without_kim_there"]
Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks_without_kim_there"]
!(Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks_without_kim_there"])
You: ""Maybe it's related to what happene..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe it's related to what happened in the church -- Soona's experiment..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Weird as it is, this situation is..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Speedfreaks FM.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Speedfreaks FM."

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds like a station for idiots.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like a station for idiots."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't explain how they heard it,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't explain how they heard it," he says, ignoring your comment. "I believe they heard something. And given the poverty of this part of town, I don't know how they could have heard a radio. However..."

fields.Title: You: ""Entroponetic crosstalk?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Entroponetic crosstalk?"

fields.Title: You: ""I got nothing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I got nothing."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait a second. How do you know tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait a second. How do you know that station?"

fields.Title: You: ""Are you a fan of the station, Kim?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you a fan of the station, Kim?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You must be mistaken," the lieuten..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You must be mistaken," the lieutenant says in a calm, measured tone. "Anyway."

fields.Title: You: ""It's a mystery though. Mysteries a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a mystery though. Mysteries are our business."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises an eyebrow. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant raises an eyebrow. "Well. That is true..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." His answer is immediate. "I j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." His answer is immediate. "I just... don't see how this furthers our investigation into a murder. That's all."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "An ocean breeze blows in strong. He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An ocean breeze blows in strong. He raises his jacket collar against it.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "No hesitation. He knows it well. Pr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No hesitation. He knows it well. Probably has the channel saved to his radio.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're going to stay focused on the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're going to stay focused on the *case*, officer," the lieutenant says, words heavy with anger.

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds like a good time!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like a good time!"

fields.Title: Drama: "You have seen through the veil he w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You have seen through the veil he would have drawn o're your eyes. Do with this what thou wilt!

fields.Title: You: ""Are you just embarrassed that we m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you just embarrassed that we may have to contact Speedfreaks FM?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is grimly silent."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is grimly silent.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Mysteries like *who killed th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Mysteries like *who killed the hanged man* are our business. Not this..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't *know* how they heard it,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't *know* how they heard it, but..." He returns his gaze to you. "I know the station they imitated. So they must have heard it somehow."

fields.Title: You: ""Speedfreaks FM, huh?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Speedfreaks FM, huh?"

fields.Title: You: ""Wasn't your radio tuned into Speed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wasn't your radio tuned into Speedfreaks FM?"

fields.Title: Variable["village.kim_volition_do_not_engage_radio"]
Variable["village.kim_volition_do_not_engage_radio"]
!(Variable["village.kim_volition_do_not_engage_radio"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. You're not going to try to rec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. You're not going to try to recruit the twins to the Remote Viewers Division..."

fields.Title: You: ""I suspect you're embarrassed to ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suspect you're embarrassed to call Speedfreaks FM, Kim."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks"]
Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks"]
!(Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""I believe they heard something," h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I believe they heard something," he says, glancing back at the twins. "And given the poverty of this part of town, I don't know how they could have heard a radio."

fields.Title: Composure: "The lieutenant isn't usually a man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant isn't usually a man who checks his watch without reason. He was trying to stay cool. Don't push now -- keep an eye out for it again later.

fields.Title: Logic: "A calculated response. To say *why..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A calculated response. To say *why the hell did you snoop on my radio?* would be reasonable -- but it would confirm he likes the station. Instead, he dismisses it. He must be embarrassed by his affection for Speedfreaks FM.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah. Local station, known for its..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah. Local station, known for its kinetic music and aggressive style."

fields.Title: You: "(Cough under your breath.) "Seolite..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Cough under your breath.) "Seolite spy-tech."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Weird as it is, this situation is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Weird as it is, this situation is not connected to the murder. This isn't our business."

fields.Title: You: ""But it is related, Kim. The wind t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But it is related, Kim. The wind told me so."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." The lieutenant checks his wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm." The lieutenant checks his watch. "Anyway."

fields.Title: Untitled hub (02)
Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks_without_kim_there"]
Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks_without_kim_there"]
!(Variable["plaza.kineema_radio_speedfreaks_without_kim_there"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah." The lieutenant checks his w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah." The lieutenant checks his watch. "Anyway."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Yes, of course! Earlier, when you t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, of course! Earlier, when you turned the radio on in his Kineema!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's at least rule out radios bef..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's at least rule out radios before continuing. Maybe the twins didn't know it was a radio they were hearing..."

fields.Title: You: ""Didn't Ruby have advanced radio kn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Didn't Ruby have advanced radio know-how?"

fields.Title: You: ""What channel was it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What channel was it?"

fields.Title: Volition: "He was clearly uncomfortable discus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He was clearly uncomfortable discussing it before. He still is. You have nothing to gain from pushing his buttons.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""After you." The lieutenant gesture..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "After you." The lieutenant gestures toward the old woman.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Besides. Maybe it was just a radio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Besides. Maybe it was just a radio they overheard -- they might not be old enough to know the difference. How would they have heard the voices?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He pauses. "It's... important in ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He pauses. "It's... important in our line to know about all sorts of things. I know a little bit about radio culture."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Neither do I." He sighs."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Neither do I." He sighs.

fields.Title: Untitled hub (02)
